Package org.apache.drill.exec.memory

Memory Allocation, Account and Management See the README.md file in this directory for detailed information about Drill's memory allocation subsystem.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AllocationReservation
    Supports cumulative allocation reservation.
    BufferAllocator
    Wrapper class to deal with byte buffer allocation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accountant
    Provides a concurrent way to manage account for memory usage without locking.
    AllocationManager
    Manages the relationship between one or more allocators and a particular UDLE.
    BaseAllocator  
    BoundsChecking  
    BoundsCheckingTest  
    DrillByteBufAllocator
    An implementation of ByteBufAllocator that wraps a Drill BufferAllocator.
    RootAllocator
    The root allocator for using direct memory inside a Drillbit.
    RootAllocatorFactory  
    TestAccountant  
    TestAllocators  
    TestBaseAllocator  
    TestEndianess  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Accountant.AllocationOutcome
    Describes the type of outcome that occurred when trying to account for allocation of memory.
    BaseAllocator.Verbosity  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AllocatorClosedException
    Exception thrown when a closed BufferAllocator is used.

Package org.apache.drill.exec.memory Description

Memory Allocation, Account and Management See the README.md file in this directory for detailed information about Drill's memory allocation subsystem.
